name: Transform Quotes to Viral Videos with Gemini, GPT & ElevenLabs for Social Media

user.name: LukaszB
user.bio:
AI Automation Expert | Web & Mobile App Integrator
With 2+ years of experience, I build smart automations, web & mobile app workflows, and scalable platforms using tools like n8n, Make, and more. I help businesses reduce operational costs, save time, and scale faster with AI-powered solutions.  For business enquiries, send me an email at  kontakt@lumizone.pl

description:
# üé¨ AI Cinematic Quote Reels Generator ‚Äì Turn Quotes into Viral Videos Automatically

Transform a single quote into a fully-rendered cinematic short video ‚Äî with voice-over, visuals, and music ‚Äî then publish it directly to TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.  
This isn‚Äôt just automation. It‚Äôs a full-stack AI video content engine built entirely in **n8n**.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è What It Does

- Converts any quote into an **8-second cinematic video** (vertical, 1080x1920)
- Adds **AI-generated voice-over, music, and visuals**
- Generates viral-ready captions for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts
- Publishes automatically via Postiz API
- Pulls content from Google Sheets ‚Äî updates status after posting (no duplicates)

---

## üîç How It Works

1. Triggers daily or manually
2. Fetches one unposted quote row from Google Sheets
3. Uses **Google Gemini + GPT** to write scene + captions
4. Converts quote to voice with **ElevenLabs**
5. Renders video via **Google VEO3**
6. Merges audio + video + text in **Creatomate**
7. Upscales the final video via **Cloudinary**
8. Publishes directly to all 3 platforms via **Postiz**
9. Marks the quote as ‚ÄúPosted‚Äù in the sheet ‚úÖ

---

## üìä Where the Data Comes From

All input (quote, tone, mood, style, voice ID) is stored in a Google Sheet.  
The workflow processes one new row per run ‚Äî no duplicates, no missed posts.

---

## üöÄ Why It Matters

- Save **hours of creative work** every week  
- Deliver **high-quality, daily content** with zero effort  
- Create **consistent brand presence** across all major short-form platforms  
- Ideal for **creators, agencies, solopreneurs, SaaS founders, and content marketers**

---

## üì¶ What's Included

- ‚úÖ Full n8n JSON workflow (Cloud & Self-hosted compatible)  
- ‚úÖ Google Sheets template with ready-to-use structure  
- ‚úÖ Platform-specific post generator (TikTok, IG, YouTube Shorts)  
- ‚úÖ Gemini + GPT prompt structure built-in  
- ‚úÖ Voice-over via ElevenLabs  
- ‚úÖ Complete documentation (PDF + inline sticky notes)  
- ‚úÖ Setup instructions for all APIs and tokens

---

## üìà What Results It Delivers

Clients have used it to:

- Launch daily video content channels on autopilot  
- Get 30k+ organic views from quote-based Shorts  
- Turn Notion/Sheet ideas into professional, scroll-stopping content  
- Deliver AI-powered video services to clients with **zero editing**

---

üí° If you're serious about scaling content with AI,  
this is the workflow that gets you there ‚Äî without lifting a finger.

Let me know if you'd like a walkthrough or need help adapting it to your use case.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
